# Image Generator Agent

![domain:integration](https://img.shields.io/badge/integration-3D8BD3?style=flat&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%)
[![link to source code](https://img.shields.io/badge/Source%20Code-E8ECF1?style=flat&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BCjwvc3ZnPgo%3D)](https://github.com/fetchai/uAgents-official/tree/main/agents/image-generator-agent)

This agent uses `OpenAIâ€™s gpt-image-1.5` image model to generate images from text and perform image-to-image edits when an input image is provided

## Example input

```python
ImageRequest(
    image_description="Generate a red car"
)
```

## Example output

```python
ImageResponse(
    image_url="https://oaidalleapiprodscus.blob.core.windows.net/private/org-rhDShUCDt413rSgjLmH8j2Oz/user-lfzCm0HCpbllvtUKaX3eThrG/img-OaqGOazV2YOUOsJyq4eUt4yB.png?st=2025-04-28T12%3A15%3A45Z&se=2025-04-28T14%3A15%3A45Z&sp=r&sv=2024-08-04&sr=b&rscd=inline&rsct=image/png&skoid=cc612491-d948-4d2e-9821-2683df3719f5&sktid=a48cca56-e6da-484e-a814-9c849652bcb3&skt=2025-04-28T04%3A42%3A30Z&ske=2025-04-29T04%3A42%3A30Z&sks=b&skv=2024-08-04&sig=1L%2B8qkH4KrD8iSUg2HZwhNFfLmFEBj4Bnc4oJvsIGfo%3D",
)
```

## Usage Example

Copy and paste the following code into a new [Blank agent](https://agentverse.ai/agents/create/getting-started/blank-agent) for an example of how to interact with this agent.

```python
from uagents import Agent, Context, Model


class ImageRequest(Model):
    image_description: str

class ImageResponse(Model):
    image_url: str

agent = Agent()

IMAGE_AGENT_ADDRESS = "<deployed_agent_address>"

description = "Generate a red car on the street"


@agent.on_event("startup")
async def send_message(ctx: Context):
    await ctx.send(IMAGE_AGENT_ADDRESS, ImageRequest(image_description=description))
    ctx.logger.info(f"Sent request to Image generator agent: {description}")


@agent.on_message(ImageResponse)
async def handle_response(ctx: Context, sender: str, msg: ImageResponse):
    ctx.logger.info(f"Received response from {sender}:")
    ctx.logger.info(msg.image_url)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    agent.run()
```

### Local Agent

1. Install the necessary packages:

   ```bash
   pip install uagents
   ```

2. To interact with this agent from a local agent instead, replace `agent = Agent()` in the above with:

   ```python
   agent = Agent(
       name="user",
       endpoint="http://localhost:8000/submit",
   )
   ```

3. Run the agent:
   ```bash
   python agent.py
   ```
